Pittsburgh.William Penn Snyder House: The William Penn Snyder House at 850 Ridge Avenue in the Allegheny West neighborhood of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, was built in 1911. It was added to the List of Pittsburgh History and Landmarks Foundation Historic Landmarks in 1972, the List of City of Pittsburgh historic designations on March 15, 1974, and the National Register of Historic Places on May 3, 1976. Babb, Inc., an insurance brokerage firm currently owns and occupies the building.
